message: Vue 3 UI component library created successfully
deliverables: Button.vue - ✓ Created with variants (default, primary, danger, ghost) and sizes (sm, default, lg)
Card.vue - ✓ Created with title, actions slot, and content slot
Input.vue - ✓ Created with label, error state, and all input types
Select.vue - ✓ Created with label, options, and error state
Badge.vue - ✓ Created with variants (success, danger, warning, info, purple)
Toggle.vue - ✓ Created as boolean switch with label
Table.vue - ✓ Created with columns prop, data prop, sortable, and onRowClick
Modal.vue - ✓ Created with open/close, title, content slot, and actions slot
Spinner.vue - ✓ Created as loading indicator with sizes
Stat.vue - ✓ Created with label, value, icon, and trend
GaugeComponent.vue - ✓ Created as radial progress indicator for CPU/memory
MiniChart.vue - ✓ Created as sparkline chart using canvas with smooth curves
index.ts - ✓ Created barrel export with all components and types

technicalDetails.accessibility: ARIA labels, keyboard navigation, semantic HTML

features.Button: 4 variants, 3 sizes, disabled state, click emission
features.Card: Optional title, actions slot, content slot, configurable padding
features.Input: All HTML5 input types, label, error state, required indicator, auto-generated IDs
features.Select: Options array, placeholder, error state, required indicator
features.Badge: 5 color variants with dark mode support
features.Toggle: Boolean switch with label, disabled state, accessibility
features.Table: Generic TypeScript support, sortable columns, row click, custom cell slots
features.Modal: Teleport to body, backdrop click, ESC key, size variants, transitions
features.Stat: Label, value, optional icon, trend indicators (up/down/neutral)
features.GaugeComponent: Radial SVG progress, 5 colors, 3 sizes, percentage display
features.MiniChart: Canvas-based sparkline, smooth curves, 5 colors, auto-scaling, gradient fill

notes: All components use Tailwind CSS 4 classes for styling
Dark mode support via dark: prefixes
defineProps and defineEmits for type-safe props/events
Generic type support in Table component
Teleport API used in Modal for body mounting
Canvas API used in MiniChart for performance
SVG used in GaugeComponent for crisp rendering
TypeScript errors in index.ts are expected until Astro project is initialized with Vue plugin
